cmd_help_print_info: turn on this to print info
cmd_help_cookies: provide cookies file if you have to skip login
cmd_help_file: database file that you want run on.
cmd_help_message: the message that you want to send to your new follower
cmd_help_stop_at: found NUM continuously old followers will stop  pass
default_message:
你好{your_name}，我是{my_name}，谢谢你关注我，你是我的第{follower_num}号关注者哟！

本消息由qqqfome项目自动发送。
项目地址：https://github.com/7sDream/qqqfome
